item.description:
Dance @MFA First Fridays Friday, February 1, 2013, 6:00 pm - 9:30 pm

Boston Museum of Fine Arts 465 Huntington Avenue, Boston, MA

Host: Steve Ob1: 603-491-1962  ob@tds.net  Carpooling from Nashua, Woburn.

Admission $25.  Discount tickets can be gotten at your local library for free.

Let dance have some drinks, and enjoy some art at the same time. MFA First Fridays is on the first Friday of each month from 6:00–9:30 pm. Join Steve Ob1. and friends for fine art, music, cash bars. Steve Ob1. plans to dance to the Dj also. They are featuring signature cocktails, and delicious tapas available for purchase. Friday, February 1, features DJ Denise LaCarubba. Steve Ob1. will have Meetup signs on the tables close to the Dj. As always, You show up introduce yourself, and Steve Ob1. will introduce to  everyone at our tables.  This ends at 9 pm. So, maybe we will go out and continue to dance some where ells.

Open to visitors 21+. Valid ID with proof of age required for entry.

http://www.mfa.org/programs/special-event/mfa-first-fridays
item.how_to_find_us: Look 4 the Meetup signs on our tables
item.name: Dance @ the Museum Fine Arts
